member.name: P:VB_Component.My.Resources.Resources.Commands
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to / DROP TABLE [dbo].[sec_Group] / CREATE TABLE [dbo].[sec_Group]( [Srl] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [GroupName] [nvarchar](50) NULL, [UsersBlocked] [bit] NULL, [JoinBlocked] [bit] NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_Group] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [Srl] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] --CREATE TABLE [dbo].[sec_Group] ADD CONSTRAINT [DF_Group_IsBlocked] DEFAULT ((0)) FOR [UsersB [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: T:VB_Component.gLabel
member.summary: Label control with built-in effects like AutoFit, MouseOver, Shadow, Outer Glow, and Pulse Glow
member.remarks: v1.0.6 01-26-2011 Added Padding Support Added TextWordWrap Property Added AutoEllispis Support v1.0.7 03-03-2011 Added MouseOverForeColor Property Added Checked Property Added Checked Color Property Added Checked Toggle State Method v1.0.8 01-03-2012 Added BlendItemsConverter Cleaned up Default Values Added CheckedType Property
